entry.title: Sea Turtles ZigZag Paper Straws - Red/White (50PCS)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper-Straws.ca
Type:
Price: 1.99

Enjoy your drink with these absolutely amazing paper straws! Colorful, bright and guaranteed to bring you joy while you enjoy your drink. Let's protect the environment one paper straw at a time!

Product Description:

  • Each order contains 50 Paper Straws (2 x 25 straws)
  • Our straws are made from food safe paper and are safe to recycle
  • Each straw is 197mm (7.75in) long with a 6mm (0.24in) outer diameter
  • Our straws are made with FDA approved paper
  • Paper Straws are perfect for weddings, birthdays and every other event you can think of! We have a suitable design for all events.
  • We can provide paper straws in Edmonton and Canada through our partnership with Canada Post. 
  • We are proud to have the capacity to ship to over 150 countries
  • Our paper straws are available in wholesale pricing (MOQ applicable)
  • International buyers are welcome to email us directly at international ( at ) paper-straws.ca. Our freight and customs partner is ready to get your order going! 
  • We welcome the opportunity to serve your custom needs for your branded or custom designed straws
  • Our straws are professionally made in China
